long_description: The straightforward, rechargeable CygoLite Turbo 800 bike light puts out a bright 800 lumens of light in a budget-friendly design for commuting and everyday riding. Bright LED pumps out up to 800 lumens and features 6 lighting modes. Aluminum casing helps protect the light and improves durability; weathertight design protects light from inclement conditions. Ultra-slim, rechargeable lithium ion battery lasts 2 hrs. on the highest setting and up to 15 hrs. on low, plus you get up to 23 hrs. on the flash setting. Battery is small enough to be mounted on the stem. Low-battery indicator gives you a heads up when it's time to recharge so you don't run out of power mid-ride. Quick-release mount on the CygoLite Turbo 800 bike light fits 25.4 - 31.8mm handlebars.
short_description: The straightforward, rechargeable CygoLite Turbo 800 bike light puts out a bright 800 lumens of light in a budget-friendly design for commuting and everyday riding.
